analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x9a2d74ea6ee7904e277803a6fdf9edea5e858e2c.sol:
	Contract CAPToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x9a2d74ea6ee7904e277803a6fdf9edea5e858e2c.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0x9a2d74ea6ee7904e277803a6fdf9edea5e858e2c.sol:
